question.body: Canaliculi in bones allow for what?

multiple_choice.choice: extra stress to be put on the bone without breaking
information to be rapidly transmitted to many osteocytes

response.feedback: Incorrect. Canaliculi are bone ECM canals with cytoplasmic extensions of the osteocytes and do not add to the stressresistance of bone.
Correct. Canaliculi are bone ECM canals with cytoplasmic extensions of the osteocytes and allow for fast information transfer.
Incorrect. Canalicuili do not store iron.
Incorrect. Red bone marrow not canaliculi is responsible for the formation of blood cells.
